title: THE ISEKAI DOCTOR: Any sufficiently advanced medical science is indistinguishable from magic.
description: Amami is a kind doctor who always puts other people first. Struck by lightning and knocked unconscious, he woke up to find himself in a parallel world peopled by beast folk, with a chimera stalking around to boot! How will Amami fare as a doctor teleported to a strange world where technology is virtually nonexistent, and medicine is treated like magic?
author: Houkou Tsuda
